item.title: My Doppelganger
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: A few weeks ago I got email from someone in Australia named "Troy Hakala" who found this site. "Hakala" is a common name in Finland, but "Troy" is relatively rare, but I've never heard of another Troy Hakala before. And I dominate a Google search for Troy Hakala, which makes someone who loves his anonymity uncomfortable. Today I found that the other Troy Hakala has been published on Opinion Online. It sounds like Australia is no better than the US on gay rights.
